ygData.subject: OT - Final Fantasy X
ygData.msgSnippet: I m playing it now.  (well...not RIGHT now )  If they ve added sounds, I haven t noticed them.  Then again, I didn t notice the lack of sounds in FF7.
ygData.messageBody:
I'm playing it now. (well...not RIGHT now <g>) If they've added sounds, I
haven't noticed them. Then again, I didn't notice the lack of sounds in
FF7. Skipped 8 & 9.

What's wrong with the combat interface?

Evulia



KAZ
<kazvorpal@ya To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
hoo.com> cc:
Subject: Re: [eqbards] [OT] Word of
02/18/2002 the Day
05:20 PM
Please
respond to
eqbards






--- JESSICA_WEBBER@... wrote:
> *** Scarier than that: an in-law's very young son, on a visit to a farm
> with his mom, pointed to some hens and said, "Look mommy, Chocobos."

I have always been grossly disappointed in Final Fantasy...with all that
graphic hoopla, you'd think they could spend a few moments/megs adding
actual
sounds instead of the pointless, endless MIDI nonsense, and get rid of the
horrible Japanese RPG combat interface, too.

I hear they have actually added sounds in FF10, though.
